page.title: 10COMMUNICATION IN ABERNYTE
page.content: The Postman starts at work 6am in Perth when he collects and sorts the Inchture mail. He finishes at about noon in Inchture. He goes round by The Knapp,The Ballo,Dundriven The Ford, Kinnard, Ballindean back to Abernyte and finishing at Baledgarno. He does 70 miles a day. During his round he empties 5 boxes,only 3 in our area.He returns to the Post Office in Inchture at midday. He returns to the P.Office Inchture.He collects pensions,family allowance and stamps for people who cannot get to the Post Office.The postman wears a grey uniform and a navy tie.He has a red badge on his jacket that tells you his number is 55.The cost of a 1st class stamp is 17p.The cost of a 2nd class is 13p.
